Luckily, EPAM highly values employee’s personal development. We have a vast range of resources and tools to choose from (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/start\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"check out our Learn Catalog\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"). However, just as important as the decision to learn something new is the decision of what to learn. Often, complex engagements demand the collaboration of Design, Consulting, and Delivery. If you strong in one area, we recommend exploring the others to get a baseline understanding of the other expertise you’ll be working with. out \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://levelup.epam.com/welcome\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s Level Up\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" tool. Level Up is an all-in-one learning and career development platform that provides personalized career possibilities, explains how to reach them and guides you on the way to your career goal. Level Up helps you set a target career goal and then lays out the skills and trainings needed to achieve that goal.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
